snippet: Serena Williams overcame a right ankle injury to win her first match at the Australian Open, routing Edina Gallovits-Hall of Romania, 6-0, 6-0, in Melbourne.
abstract: Australian Open Roundup; Serena Williams overcomes right ankle injury to win her first match at Australian Open, routing Edina Gallovits-Hall; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams overcame a right ankle injury to win her first match at the Australian Open, routing Edina Gallovits-Hall of Romania, 6-0, 6-0, in Melbourne.

headline.seo: Serena Williams Dominates Opener Despite Injury and Andy Murray Cruises to Win
